params.pool: The address of the Pool contract

encodeBorrowParams(address,uint256,uint2.details: Without an onBehalfOf parameter as the compact calls to L2Pool will use msg.sender as onBehalfOf

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset to borrow
params.interestRateMode: The interest rate mode at which the user wants to borrow: 2 for Variable, 1 is deprecated (changed on v3.2.0)
params.referralCode: The code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards.   0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man

params.collateralAsset: The address of the underlying asset used as collateral, to receive as result of the liquidation
params.debtAsset: The address of the underlying borrowed asset to be repaid with the liquidation
params.debtToCover: The debt amount of borrowed `asset` the liquidator wants to cover
params.receiveAToken: True if the liquidators wants to receive the collateral aTokens, `false` if he wants to receive the underlying collateral asset directly
params.user: The address of the borrower getting liquidated

returns._0: First half ot compact representation of liquidation call parameters
returns._1: Second half ot compact representation of liquidation call parameters

encodeRepayParams(address,uint256,uint25.details: Without an onBehalfOf parameter as the compact calls to L2Pool will use msg.sender as onBehalfOf

params.amount: The amount to repay - Send the value type(uint256).max in order to repay the whole debt for `asset` on the specific `interestRateMode`
params.asset: The address of the borrowed underlying asset previously borrowed
params.interestRateMode: The interest rate mode at of the debt the user wants to repay: 2 for Variable, 1 is deprecated (changed on v3.2.0)

params.amount: The amount to repay - Send the value type(uint256).max in order to repay the whole debt for `asset` on the specific `debtMode`
params.asset: The address of the borrowed underlying asset previously borrowed
params.interestRateMode: The interest rate mode at of the debt the user wants to repay: 2 for Variable, 1 is deprecated  (changed on v3.2.0)

returns._0: compact representation of repay with aToken parameters

encodeRepayWithPermitParams(address,uint.details: Without an onBehalfOf parameter as the compact calls to L2Pool will use msg.sender as onBehalfOf

params.amount: The amount to repay - Send the value type(uint256).max in order to repay the whole debt for `asset` on the specific `debtMode`
params.asset: The address of the borrowed underlying asset previously borrowed
params.deadline: The deadline timestamp that the permit is valid
params.interestRateMode: The interest rate mode at of the debt the user wants to repay: 2 for Variable, 1 is deprecated (changed on v3.2.0)
params.permitR: The R parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params.permitS: The S parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params.permitV: The V parameter of ERC712 permit sig

returns._1: The R parameter of ERC712 permit sig
returns._2: The S parameter of ERC712 permit sig

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset borrowed
params.useAsCollateral: True if the user wants to use the supply as collateral, false otherwise

returns._0: compact representation of set user use reserve as collateral parameters

encodeSupplyParams(address,uint256,uint1.details: Without an onBehalfOf parameter as the compact calls to L2Pool will use msg.sender as onBehalfOf

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset to supply
params.referralCode: referralCode Code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards.   0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man

encodeSupplyWithPermitParams(address,uin.details: Without an onBehalfOf parameter as the compact calls to L2Pool will use msg.sender as onBehalfOf

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset to supply
params.deadline: The deadline timestamp that the permit is valid
params.permitR: The R parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params.permitS: The S parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params.permitV: The V parameter of ERC712 permit sig
params.referralCode: referralCode Code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards.   0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man

returns._1: The R parameter of ERC712 permit sig
returns._2: The S parameter of ERC712 permit sig

encodeWithdrawParams(address,uint256).details: Without a to parameter as the compact calls to L2Pool will use msg.sender as to

params.amount: The underlying amount to be withdrawn
params.asset: The address of the underlying asset to withdraw

encodeBorrowParams(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Encodes borrow parameters from standard input to compact representation of 1 bytes32

encodeLiquidationCall(address,address,ad.notice: Encodes liquidation call parameters from standard input to compact representation of 2 bytes32

encodeRepayParams(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Encodes repay parameters from standard input to compact representation of 1 bytes32

encodeRepayWithATokensParams(address,uin.notice: Encodes repay with aToken parameters from standard input to compact representation of 1 bytes32

encodeRepayWithPermitParams(address,uint.notice: Encodes repayWithPermit parameters from standard input to compact representation of 3 bytes32

encodeSetUserUseReserveAsCollateral(addr.notice: Encodes set user use reserve as collateral parameters from standard input to compact representation of 1 bytes32

encodeSupplyParams(address,uint256,uint1.notice: Encodes supply parameters from standard input to compact representation of 1 bytes32

encodeSupplyWithPermitParams(address,uin.notice: Encodes supplyWithPermit parameters from standard input to compact representation of 3 bytes32

encodeWithdrawParams(address,uint256).notice: Encodes withdraw parameters from standard input to compact representation of 1 bytes32
